verbose_text: Thus, Li et al. have shown that oral administration of Almorexant in the conscious SHR reduces mean arterial blood pressure (~ 30 mmHg), heart rate and plasma noradrenaline during both wakefulness and NREM sleep, but has no significant effect in normotensive WKY rats.
evidence: Li et al.               have shown that oral administration of Almorexant in the conscious SHR reduces mean arterial blood pressure (~30 mmHg), heart rate and plasma noradrenaline
